channel.title: Star Wars Minute Season 1
channel.description: Alex Robinson and Pete The Retailer analyze, criticize and philosophize the STAR WARS movies, one minute at a time.
channel.itunes:author: Shampoopoo
channel.itunes:summary: Alex Robinson and Pete The Retailer analyze, criticize and philosophize the STAR WARS movies, one minute at a time.

item.title: Part 2 of A Very Special Star Wars Minute Star Wars Holiday Special Special: Live!
item.description: The conclusion of the Star Wars Holiday Special, with special guests Josh Flanagan and Rachael Fox
item.itunes:title: Part 2 of A Very Special Star Wars Minute Star Wars Holiday Special Special: Live!
item.itunes:summary: The conclusion of the Star Wars Holiday Special, with special guests Josh Flanagan and Rachael Fox
item.content:encoded: The conclusion of the Star Wars Holiday Special, with special guests Josh Flanagan and Rachael Fox

item.title: Part 1 of A Very Special Star Wars Minute Star Wars Holiday Special Special: Live!
item.description: We cover the first hour of the infamous Star Wars Holiday Special with special guests Joe Dator and Chris Radtke
item.itunes:title: Part 1 of A Very Special Star Wars Minute Star Wars Holiday Special Special: Live!
item.itunes:summary: We cover the first hour of the infamous Star Wars Holiday Special with special guests Joe Dator and Chris Radtke

item.title: Bonus Episode: The Ink Banthas Holiday Special
item.description: The 'lost' episode of The Ink Banthas Show, featuring Alex Robinson, Pete The Retailer, and Josh Flanagan.

item.title: Minute 122: Nailed It!
item.description: THE END
item.itunes:title: Minute 122: Nailed It!
item.itunes:summary: THE END

item.title: Minute 121: Viewer Mail
item.description: The Conclusion of the Closing Credits.

item.itunes:summary: The Conclusion of the Closing Credits.

item.title: Minute 120: Go Get It, Luke
item.description: Part Two of the End Credits. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.description: Part One of the End Credits. Guest commentator: Christian Dumais

item.title: Minute 118: I Was a Porkins
item.description: Chewbacca growls and Artoo beeps with happiness. FADE OUT. Guest commentator: J.K. Woodward
item.itunes:title: Minute 118: I Was a Porkins
item.itunes:summary: Chewbacca growls and Artoo beeps with happiness. FADE OUT. Guest commentator: J.K. Woodward
item.content:encoded: Chewbacca growls and Artoo beeps with happiness. FADE OUT. Guest commentator: J.K. Woodward

item.title: Minute 117: Jangle
item.description: Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautiful. She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck. He winks at her. She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, who is moved by the event. Guest commentator: John Kovalic
item.itunes:title: Minute 117: Jangle
item.itunes:summary: Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautiful. She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck. He winks at her. She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, who is moved by the event. Guest commentator: John Kovalic
item.content:encoded: Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautiful. She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck. He winks at her. She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, who is moved by the event. Guest commentator: John Kovalic

item.title: Minute 116: A Kind of Garbled Hey
item.description: Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by a throng of ground crew and pilots. Luke climbs down the ladder as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouting. Guest commentator: Mike Norton
item.itunes:title: Minute 116: A Kind of Garbled Hey
item.itunes:summary: Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by a throng of ground crew and pilots. Luke climbs down the ladder as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouting. Guest commentator: Mike Norton
item.content:encoded: Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by a throng of ground crew and pilots. Luke climbs down the ladder as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouting. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Minute 115: The Actual Blowing Up
item.description: The Death Star bursts into a supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Minute 115: The Actual Blowing Up
item.itunes:summary: The Death Star bursts into a supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.content:encoded: The Death Star bursts into a supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Minute 114: I Can Hear You
item.description: Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpit. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Minute 114: I Can Hear You
item.itunes:summary: Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpit. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.content:encoded: Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpit. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Minute 113: Let Go, Luke
item.description: A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he closes his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Minute 113: Let Go, Luke
item.itunes:summary: A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he closes his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.content:encoded: A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he closes his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Minute 112: Wormie Wins Big
item.description: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fighters, still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Minute 112: Wormie Wins Big
item.itunes:summary: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fighters, still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.content:encoded: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fighters, still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Minute 111: Luke Hogs the Glory
item.description: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter. Red Leader buys it, creating a tremendous explosion far below. He screams and is destroyed. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Minute 111: Luke Hogs the Glory
item.itunes:summary: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter. Red Leader buys it, creating a tremendous explosion far below. He screams and is destroyed. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.content:encoded: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter. Red Leader buys it, creating a tremendous explosion far below. He screams and is destroyed. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Minute 110: No Sign of Any...
item.description: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death Star trench. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.itunes:title: Minute 110: No Sign of Any...
item.itunes:summary: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death Star trench. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.content:encoded: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death Star trench. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Minute 109: Big Bad German Guy
item.description: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris in all directions. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.itunes:title: Minute 109: Big Bad German Guy
item.itunes:summary: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris in all directions. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.content:encoded: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris in all directions. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Minute 108: The Cadillac of Snubfighters
item.description: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically toward the Death Star surface. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.itunes:title: Minute 108: The Cadillac of Snubfighters
item.itunes:summary: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically toward the Death Star surface. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.content:encoded: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically toward the Death Star surface. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Minute 107: You Get Called a Bob
item.description: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star, an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.itunes:title: Minute 107: You Get Called a Bob
item.itunes:summary: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star, an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.content:encoded: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star, an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Minute 106: Frankensteins
item.description: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star horizon, four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fighters. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.itunes:title: Minute 106: Frankensteins
item.itunes:summary: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star horizon, four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fighters. Guest commentator: Joe Dator
item.content:encoded: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star horizon, four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fighters. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Minute 105: Thirty Rebel Ships
item.description: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneuvers his craft through a wall of laser fire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.itunes:title: Minute 105: Thirty Rebel Ships
item.itunes:summary: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneuvers his craft through a wall of laser fire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.content:encoded: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneuvers his craft through a wall of laser fire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Minute 104: Look at the Size of That Thing!
item.description: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesome size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.itunes:title: Minute 104: Look at the Size of That Thing!
item.itunes:summary: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesome size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.content:encoded: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesome size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Minute 103: So Long, Piggy
item.description: The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the "X" position. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.itunes:title: Minute 103: So Long, Piggy
item.itunes:summary: The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the "X" position. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.content:encoded: The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the "X" position. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Minute 102: Blue Squadron
item.description: The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as the pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.itunes:title: Minute 102: Blue Squadron
item.itunes:summary: The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as the pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.content:encoded: The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as the pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Minute 101: Where the Biggs Scene Would Go
item.description: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.itunes:title: Minute 101: Where the Biggs Scene Would Go
item.itunes:summary: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton
item.content:encoded: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Minute 100: Bro Loses Bro
item.description: Luke is quite saddened at the sight of his friend's departure. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.itunes:title: Minute 100: Bro Loses Bro
item.itunes:summary: Luke is quite saddened at the sight of his friend's departure. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.content:encoded: Luke is quite saddened at the sight of his friend's departure. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan

item.title: Minute 99: New Filters
item.description: The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward the tiny green moon. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.itunes:title: Minute 99: New Filters
item.itunes:summary: The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward the tiny green moon. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.content:encoded: The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward the tiny green moon. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan

item.title: Minute 98: Fake Wedge
item.description: The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots, navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots. Everyone is listening intently to what Dodonna is saying. Han and Chewbacca are standing near the back. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.itunes:title: Minute 98: Fake Wedge
item.itunes:summary: The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots, navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots. Everyone is listening intently to what Dodonna is saying. Han and Chewbacca are standing near the back. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.content:encoded: The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots, navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots. Everyone is listening intently to what Dodonna is saying. Han and Chewbacca are standing near the back. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan

item.title: Minute 97: Bank Robbery at Three O'Clock
item.description: Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient temple lies shrouded in an eerie mist. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.itunes:title: Minute 97: Bank Robbery at Three O'Clock
item.itunes:summary: Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient temple lies shrouded in an eerie mist. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.content:encoded: Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient temple lies shrouded in an eerie mist. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan

item.title: Minute 96: The Han-Luke Spectrum
item.description: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the planet Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.itunes:title: Minute 96: The Han-Luke Spectrum
item.itunes:summary: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the planet Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan
item.content:encoded: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the planet Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons. Guest commentator: Josh Flanagan

item.title: Minute 95: Han's Neg
item.description: Han removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls of the ship. Chewie moves into the aft section to check the damage. Leia is seated near Han. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Minute 95: Han's Neg
item.itunes:summary: Han removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls of the ship. Chewie moves into the aft section to check the damage. Leia is seated near Han. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: Han removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls of the ship. Chewie moves into the aft section to check the damage. Leia is seated near Han. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Minute 94: This Isn't The End
item.description: The fighter comes closer, firing at thepirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cannon hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic shower ofburning fragments. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Minute 94: This Isn't The End
item.itunes:summary: The fighter comes closer, firing at thepirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cannon hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic shower ofburning fragments. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: The fighter comes closer, firing at thepirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cannon hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic shower ofburning fragments. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Minute 93: Here They Come!
item.description: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Falcon, one each veering off to the left and right of the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Minute 93: Here They Come!
item.itunes:summary: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Falcon, one each veering off to the left and right of the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Falcon, one each veering off to the left and right of the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Minute 92: Crying at the Chess Table
item.description: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off blankly as the robots look on. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Minute 92: Crying at the Chess Table
item.itunes:summary: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off blankly as the robots look on. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off blankly as the robots look on. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Minute 91: Run, Luke! Run!
item.description: Luke starts for the advancing troops, as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Minute 91: Run, Luke! Run!
item.itunes:summary: Luke starts for the advancing troops, as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: Luke starts for the advancing troops, as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Minute 90: The Shower of the Universe
item.description: Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.itunes:title: Minute 90: The Shower of the Universe
item.itunes:summary: Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.content:encoded: Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Minute 89: Spaceballs
item.description: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.itunes:title: Minute 89: Spaceballs
item.itunes:summary: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.content:encoded: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Minute 88: The Learner
item.description: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right moment. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.itunes:title: Minute 88: The Learner
item.itunes:summary: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right moment. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.content:encoded: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right moment. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Minute 87: Levels Five and Six
item.description: Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous abyss to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.itunes:title: Minute 87: Levels Five and Six
item.itunes:summary: Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous abyss to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.content:encoded: Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous abyss to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Minute 86: Wrong Turn
item.description: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infinity. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.itunes:title: Minute 86: Wrong Turn
item.itunes:summary: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infinity. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago
item.content:encoded: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infinity. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Minute 85: Quite a Thing to See
item.description: With the help of the Force, Ben deftly slips past the troopers and into the main hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Minute 85: Quite a Thing to See
item.itunes:summary: With the help of the Force, Ben deftly slips past the troopers and into the main hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: With the help of the Force, Ben deftly slips past the troopers and into the main hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Minute 84: Walking Carpet
item.description: The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Minute 84: Walking Carpet
item.itunes:summary: The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hallway. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Minute 83: Crazy Chasm
item.description: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge tractor beam. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Minute 83: Crazy Chasm
item.itunes:summary: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge tractor beam. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge tractor beam. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Minute 82: Jarvis
item.description: Luke begs Threepio to shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Minute 82: Jarvis
item.itunes:summary: Luke begs Threepio to shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: Luke begs Threepio to shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Minute 81: Guys in Costumes
item.description: As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and smaller. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Minute 81: Guys in Costumes
item.itunes:summary: As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and smaller. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and smaller. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Minute 80: Space Camouflage
item.description: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble and edge toward the Rebels. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.itunes:title: Minute 80: Space Camouflage
item.itunes:summary: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble and edge toward the Rebels. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.content:encoded: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble and edge toward the Rebels. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel

item.title: Minute 79: The Fourth Wall
item.description: Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.itunes:title: Minute 79: The Fourth Wall
item.itunes:summary: Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.content:encoded: Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel

item.title: Minute 78: There's Something Alive in Here
item.description: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.itunes:title: Minute 78: There's Something Alive in Here
item.itunes:summary: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.content:encoded: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel

item.title: Minute 77: Issues with the Trash
item.description: Leia, Chewie, Luke, and Han find themselves in a garbage room. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.itunes:title: Minute 77: Issues with the Trash
item.itunes:summary: Leia, Chewie, Luke, and Han find themselves in a garbage room. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.content:encoded: Leia, Chewie, Luke, and Han find themselves in a garbage room. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel

item.title: Minute 76: Casual Fingers
item.description: The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate in the wall next to Han, almost frying him. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.itunes:title: Minute 76: Casual Fingers
item.itunes:summary: The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate in the wall next to Han, almost frying him. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel
item.content:encoded: The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate in the wall next to Han, almost frying him. Guest commentator: Joe Mazel

item.title: Minute 75: Imaginary Friend
item.description: A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.itunes:title: Minute 75: Imaginary Friend
item.itunes:summary: A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.content:encoded: A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian

item.title: Minute 74: I'm Here To Rescue You
item.description: Our hero frees the princess. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.itunes:title: Minute 74: I'm Here To Rescue You
item.itunes:summary: Our hero frees the princess. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.content:encoded: Our hero frees the princess. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian

item.title: Minute 73: A Lot of Cameras
item.description: Luke, Chewie and Han shoot their way onto the prison level. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.itunes:title: Minute 73: A Lot of Cameras
item.itunes:summary: Luke, Chewie and Han shoot their way onto the prison level. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.content:encoded: Luke, Chewie and Han shoot their way onto the prison level. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian

item.title: Minute 72: This...Thing
item.description: The giant Wookiee and his two guards enter the old grey security station. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.itunes:title: Minute 72: This...Thing
item.itunes:summary: The giant Wookiee and his two guards enter the old grey security station. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.content:encoded: The giant Wookiee and his two guards enter the old grey security station. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian

item.title: Minute 71: Who Can We Get To Walk By?
item.description: Han, Luke, and Chewie wait for the elevator. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.itunes:title: Minute 71: Who Can We Get To Walk By?
item.itunes:summary: Han, Luke, and Chewie wait for the elevator. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian
item.content:encoded: Han, Luke, and Chewie wait for the elevator. Guest commentator: Jackie Kashian

item.title: Minute 70: More Wealth Than You Can Imagine
item.description: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face as Han binds him with the electronic cuffs. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.itunes:title: Minute 70: More Wealth Than You Can Imagine
item.itunes:summary: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face as Han binds him with the electronic cuffs. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.content:encoded: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face as Han binds him with the electronic cuffs. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale

item.title: Minute 69: The One in the Message
item.description: R2-D2 says "I found her", and keeps repeating "She's here." Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.itunes:title: Minute 69: The One in the Message
item.itunes:summary: R2-D2 says "I found her", and keeps repeating "She's here." Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.content:encoded: R2-D2 says "I found her", and keeps repeating "She's here." Guest commentator: Fame Fatale

item.title: Minute 68: No Place for Boobs
item.description: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long grey hallway. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.itunes:title: Minute 68: No Place for Boobs
item.itunes:summary: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long grey hallway. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.content:encoded: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long grey hallway. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale

item.title: Minute 67: Pol Treidum
item.description: As the officer approaches the door, it slides open revealing the towering Chewbacca. Guest commentator: Fame Fatale
item.itunes:title: Minute 67: Pol Treidum

item.title: Minute 63: Turn the Ship Around

item.content:encoded: Minute 5 of Star Wars: The first appearance of Darth Vader, and R2-D2 receives a secret message.
